A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There were so many bad decisions made in the making of this movie. There's no need to list them all as other reviewers have done a pretty good job already.  I get the idea the director was going for\, and I didn't like it.  A very strong dislike.  I liked the actors and the whole \"mise-en-scène\" because I love everything Star Wars... except the plot\, and in how some characters were portrayed. This movie is Jar Jar Binks. yeah..
